entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:47 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 04:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -11.4°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -13.6°C
Wind: S 22 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 02:40 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 02:40 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 02:40 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
